content: Yeah, I had one other user block me awhile back, but I didn’t realize back then that the “block” also prevented other people from seeing my comment. I realized it this time because my response to this guy’s article had been getting a steady stream of “likes,” which then abruptly stopped, whereupon I then noticed that the number of “views” also had dropped off precipitously. That’s what prompted me to read about how “blocking” works. Anyway, it might help if you also raise the same blocking issue with them, if you have a chance: https://help.medium.com/hc/en-us/articles/216287508-Contact-Medium-Support.
